value.name: Colorado Springs police shoot man with military-style rifle
value.description: A Fountain police officer and a Colorado State Patrol trooper fired shots after a chase down Interstate 25 on Monday night, killing 38-year-old Robert Paul Garcia. Like us on Facebook to see ...
